pkgmetadata.longdescription: LIC for Distributed Skewed Regression // This comprehensive toolkit for skewed regression is designated as "SLIC" (The LIC for Distributed Skewed Regression Analysis). It is predicated on the assumption that the error term follows a skewed distribution, such as the Skew-Normal, Skew-t, or Skew-Laplace. The methodology and theoretical foundation of the package are described in Guo G.(2020) doi:10.1080/02664763.2022.2053949.
